resources.string: Which statement is false regarding an Activity?
Activities talk to each other using Intents
Activities are components that include a java or kotlin file and an xml file
Activities are the main AI that will control everyone when Skynet takes over
Activities represents a single screen with a user interface
Which element is NOT considered a ViewGroup?
What will cause a Lifecycle event to crash?
Not calling the superclass when creating a Lifecycle event
Forgetting to watch season 2 of the Mandalorian
Saying that Ahsoka Tano is not the greatest Jedi
Not having an offshoot series starting Ahsoka Tano
What is another name used for ActionBar?
Coroutines help to manage long-running tasks that might otherwise block the main thread and cause your app to become unresponsive
Coroutine enable you to write cleaner and more concise app code
A coroutine is a concurrency design pattern that you can use on Android to simplify code that executes asynchronously
Which statement is false regarding the AndroidManifest.xml file?
It names the Java package for the application
It describes the components of the application
It determines which processes will host application components
It declares publicly one\'s principles, policies, or intentions, especially of a political nature.
Which statement is true regarding an ImageView?
An ImageView can support vector and bitmap assets
An ImageView can make an image of anyone look 10 years younger
An ImageView can do your end of the year taxes
Welcome to the Kotlin and Android development Quiz
